doc.after: Nielsen needed medical attention due to traumatic stress caused by the accident.[16] At Skyguide, his former colleagues maintained a vase with a white rose over Nielsen's former workstation.[17] Skyguide, after initially having blamed the Russian pilot for the accident, accepted full responsibility and asked relatives of the victims for forgiveness.[18] On 19 May 2004, the official investigators found that managerial incompetence and systems failures were the main cause of the accident.[citation needed]
